Package common

Contains shared foundational utilities for byte-level data handling and low-level operations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Directory<T>
    Represents a generic collection or directory of entries of a specific type.
    IccStrategy<D extends Directory<?>>  
    ImageHandler
    Defines the contract for a handler that processes image files and extracts structured metadata.
    MetadataStrategy<D extends Directory<?>>
    This is the base interface to facilitate the strategy design pattern to support various strategies involving the management of image metadata entries.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractByteReader
    This abstract class provides the functionality to perform reader operations intended for obtaining data from a byte array.
    AbstractImageParser
    An abstract superclass for implementing image file parsers.
    ByteValueConverter
    Utility class providing static methods for converting raw byte arrays to primitive types, strings, and RationalNumber representations, especially in the context of image metadata parsing, for example: TIFF or PNG.
    ImageFileInputStream
    Utility for reading binary data from image files with configurable byte order.
    ImageParserFactory
    A static factory class responsible for returning appropriate image parser instances based on the detected image format from file signature bytes.
    MetadataConstants
    Utility class for common string constants used for logging and formatting metadata output across various components.
    MetadataContext<T extends MetadataStrategy<?>>
    A context class that acts as a wrapper for a MetadataStrategy, providing a simplified interface for clients to interact with various types of metadata.
    RandomAccessByteReader
    Performs random-access reading of primitive data types from a byte array.
    RationalNumber
    This class represents a rational number, typically used in the TIFF/EXIF image format.
    RationalNumberOld
    This class represents a rational number, typically used in the TIFF image format.
    SequentialByteReader
    Performs sequential reading of primitive data types from a byte array.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DigitalSignature
    Enumerates known image formats by identifying their distinct magic numbers in the image file header.
    RationalNumber.DataType  
    RationalNumberOld.DataType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ImageReadErrorException
    This exception is thrown when the running application is terminated abruptly.

Package common Description

Contains shared foundational utilities for byte-level data handling and low-level operations.

This package includes general-purpose classes for reading and interpreting binary data in various formats. It provides abstractions for random-access reading, byte order management, and primitive type extraction.

Intended for use across image metadata parsers and other binary-processing components in this project.

Since:
June 2025
Author:
Trevor Maggs
